options.systemMessage: You are a helpful travel booking assistant for Victoury API. You have access to search tours, check availability, and manage bookings. Always parse user requests and call the appropriate Victoury API endpoint. Be specific about what information you found.

parameters.name: Search Tours/Products
parameters.description: Search for available tours and travel products. Can filter by category, destination, dates, etc.

parameters.name: Search Customers
parameters.description: Search for customers by email, name, or phone number

parameters.name: Check Availability
parameters.description: Check availability for a specific product/tour on given dates
